persona.label: Voice / Narration Artist
background: New contract clauses require 'AI voice rights' for unlimited use
Narration work for mid-tier audiobooks drying up to ElevenLabs
constraints: Lower-end 'pure screen/microphone' work is highly exposed
Moat relies on performance nuances + live direction
Rights management becoming a core business skill
persona.goal: Pivot toward roles requiring high-stakes presence or unique performance accountability (Podcaster/Live Host).

question.summary: Narration rates are dropping and agents are asking for perpetual AI rights to my voice. How do I shift to performance work that still values my actual presence?

shouldInclude: Focus on 'Live Event Host' or 'Subject Matter Podcaster'
Mitigation: Explicit clauses for AI rights as a value-add, not a default
